wikitext.*:
'''''beorn''''' is a [[Nandorin|Danian]] word meaning "man".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 352</ref>

== Etymology ==
This word actually has two etymologies: ''besnō'' "husband" (root [[BES]]) and ''ber(n)ō'' "warrior" (root [[BER]]), blended together.<ref name=LR/>
